name: samevalueset
description: ECMAScript Set, but using SameValue instead of SameValueZero

scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc --reporter=lcov mocha --inline-diffs --check-leaks --ui tdd --reporter dot --slow 200 --timeout 5000 --recursive test --compilers js:babel-core/register && npm run check-coverage
scripts.build: babel --auxiliary-comment-before ' istanbul ignore next ' --out-dir dist src
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && npm update && npm run build

author: Michael Ficarra
